Watch this wonderful video showcasing the nature from a country called the Philippines!:

Wow Tapes: Philippines from WowTapes on Vimeo.

A Fabio Reitano film > Pristine beaches, turquoise waters, and breathtaking paradise landscapes, all make the Philippines simply unforgettable. Incredibly deep culture and traditions. The amazing food and the warmest people you'll ever meet. These are the reasons you're gonna want to come back.
